 1 <?php namespace CupOfTea\TwoStream\Exceptions;
 2 
 3 use Exception;
 4 
 5 class CatchableFatalErrorException extends Exception
 6 {
 7     
 8     /**
 9      * {@inheritdoc}
10      */
11     public function __construct($route, $error, $code = 0, Exception $previous = null)
12     {
13         $msg = 'Catchable fatal error encountered in Route "' . $route . '". The route was not executed.' . PHP_EOL . $error;
14         
15         parent::__construct($msg, $code, $previous);
16     }
17     
18 }
